text: ao mcheasa robsakhnhom. saum trong me tda aphytosa dl khnhom ning aupoukamdeay robsakhnhom ning anak del ban chaul knong phteah robsakhnhom daoyman chomnue( nung trong) ning banda anak del mean chomnue brosasrei phng . haey saum trong me tda kom banthem avei dl puok del bampean krawpi pheap vineasa ei v
